entities.name: he-who-must-not-be-named
entities.description: The main antagonist, mentioned by Professor McGonagall and Professor Sprout. ("He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named is coming")

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Harry Potter, a student who has work to do in the castle on Dumbledore's orders. ("Potter has work to do in the castle on Dumbledore's orders")

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore, mentioned as giving Potter orders. ("Potter has work to do in the castle on Dumbledore's orders")

entities.name: sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout, a teacher who is concerned about the protection of the school. ("You realize, of course, that nothing we do will be able to keep out You-Know-Who indeﬁnitely?" said Professor Sprout.)

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall, a teacher who is in charge of the protection of the school. ("Thank you, Pomona," said Professor McGonagall, and between the two witches there passed a look of grim understanding.)

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick, a teacher who gasped at the news. ("Sprout and Flitwick gasped; Slughorn let out a low groan.")

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn, a teacher who let out a low groan at the news. ("Sprout and Flitwick gasped; Slughorn let out a low groan.")

entities.name: pomona
entities.description: Professor Sprout's first name, mentioned by Professor McGonagall. ("Thank you, Pomona," said Professor McGonagall.)

relationships.description: There was a look of grim understanding between Professor McGonagall and Professor Sprout. ("between the two witches there passed a look of grim understanding.")
Professor McGonagall is concerned about the protection of the school from He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named. ("He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named is coming")

Professor Sprout is concerned about the protection of the school from He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named. ("You realize, of course, that nothing we do will be able to keep out You-Know-Who indeﬁnitely?" said Professor Sprout.)
Harry Potter is working for Dumbledore. ("Potter has work to do in the castle on Dumbledore's orders")
